thread.section_title: Walsh Brothers Shoes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Walsh Brothers Shoes | walshbrothersshoes.ie
thread.title: Regina Clarke
thread.title_full: Walsh Brothers Shoes reviewed by Regina Clarke

author: Regina Clarke
title: Regina Clarke
text: Shoes in size 4.5 that I wanted were not in stock on the Friday that I was on website but got email from Paula Casey in Walsh shoes on that day that she would check with suppliers on the following Monday. Shoes were delivered on the Thursday. So happy with shoes and brilliant service . Will definitely use this store again.
